About

Indeterminacy

Related project: Dublab
Category: Interactive
Year: 2018

Design as Performance

This is an interactive installation proposed as part of a Dublab series about chance in music, also known as indeterminacy.

An interactive microsite allows users to generate their own posters and output them in real time via a hacked dot matrix printer, then take them home as a commemoration of the event.

Create your own poster
